item.description:
I'm currently doing interval training, and wondered in anyone would want to join me on a Saturday morning run together. Considering people may be at different levels, why don't we run at a local high school track? That way, we can always be within 400 meters of each other!

I'm selecting Rockville HS in Vernon as the location, simply because I live in Vernon. However, I'm willing to change the venue to suit others who don't live out in the wilds of East of the River. Give us a shout in the comments. I'm all flexible and stuff.
item.name: Anybody up for interval training on a HS track?
